content:
# AGH University engineers with awards of Przegląd Techniczny-- AGH UST 

URL: https://agh.edu.pl/en/news/detail/agh-university-engineers
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:23:29

AGH University engineers with awards of Przegląd Techniczny 

 05-03-2025 

 awards 

Professor Rafał Dańko, AGH University Vice-Rector for Student Affairs, and Maria Sajdak, a doctoral student in the AGH University Doctoral School, were recognised in the the 31
st
 edition of the Golden Engineer plebiscite, as voted by the readers of 
Przegląd Techniczny
.

Professor Rafał Dańko – foundryman, scientist and educator, President of the Polish Foundrymen's Association – honoured with the title of Golden Engineer in the category science.

Maria Sajdak – materials scientist, doctoral student at the Faculty of Materials Science and Ceramics, rower (2016 European vice-champion, 2018 European and world champion, 2019 world vice-champion, silver medalist of the 2020 Tokio Summer Olympics) – honoured with the title of Young Engineer. On behalf of the winner, the award was received by the AGH University Rector, Professor Jerzy Lis.

The plebiscite is organised by the Polish Federation of Engineering Associations and 
Przegląd Techniczny
, a Polish engineering magazine. The award aims to promote the achievements of Polish engineers and draw attention to their role in building an innovative and competitive economy.

Back
